content.p: Find the campus that's right for you We know that staying in Nottingham through the summer is necessary for a variety of our students. To help support you we have great options available: For students attending a pre-sessional course at the University of Nottingham please see our information on pre-sessional accommodation options. If you cannot find an option that meets your needs we are happy to discuss further details with you. You can contact us directly via Live Chat or our enquiry form. Contact Us If you need accommodation over the summer vacation period we can assist with the following options:
